paper.title: A profitable currency portfolio strategy: Learning from connectedness
paper.abstract: This study proposes a profitable currency portfolio strategy integrating dynamic connectedness into machine learning (ML) predictions. The portfolio is constructed using consensus predictions of return levels from LSTM and MLP and return directions from SVM and RF. Our findings reveal that connectedness slightly enhances returns but significantly reduces return volatility, implying its role in risk management. Compared to eight classical currency trading strategies, ML-based portfolios outperform in returns and mitigating extreme losses. Notably, portfolios incorporating RF predictions achieve the highest average return and Sharpe ratio among all strategies. Additionally, ML-based portfolios exhibit significant differences from classical strategies in determining currency positions.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用机器学习方法（如LSTM、MLP、SVM和RF）构建货币投资组合策略，并评估其在回报和风险方面的表现。这直接涉及投资组合管理。同时，论文提到连接性（connectedness）显著降低了回报波动性，表明其在金融风险管理中的应用。
